products.title: Oregon Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Perfect fit oregon wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.

products.title: Hazel Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Perfect fit hazel wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.
products.productdescription: A dark brown shade, the hazel25mm perfect fit blind willbe the final part of your interior jigsaw. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the perfect fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinatingbrownheadrail and abrownbottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand.

products.title: Auburn Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Perfect fit auburn wood venetian blinds. Combine the luxury sunwood collection of 25mm wood venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with upvc windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.
products.productdescription: A dark brown shade, the auburn 25mm perfect fit blind will be the perfect finishing touch for any room. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the perfect fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinatingbrownheadrail and abrownbottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wand.

products.title: Tawny Perfect Fit

products.title: Soho Brown Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Soho brown pleated perfect fit
products.productdescription: Enjoy a classic tone in your window with the soho brown pleated dimout perfect fit. The rich brown of this blind is an ideal match for retro furnishings made from dark wood, such as mahogany and walnut. The fabric itself is not a dull one-tone, but is instead built up from overlapping multi-tonal strokes to create a lively and vivid colour. The dimout style means some light filters through in the daytime, further enlivening this exciting blind. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Moscow Oak Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Moscow oak woodline 9409 perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Luna Blackout Luna Walnut Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure luna blackout luna walnut  perfect fit pleated blind px72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Luna blackoutluna walnut perfect fit pleated blind. Part of ourluna blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "luna blackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
